page.title: 13Family Outings
page.content: WHEN WE GO ON TRIPS MY DAD, MY MAM OUR CHRISTOPHER AND I GO.WE GO AVOUT EVERY THREE WEEKS IN THE SUMMER HOLIDAYS.WHEN WE GO WE ALWAYS GET UP EARLY AND HAVE A GOOD BREAKFAST.THEN WE GET IN OUR CLOTHES,AFTER THAT MY MAM PUTS UP THE PACKED LUNCH.MY DAD AND I PUT THE THINGS IN THE CAR THEN LOCK UP AND SET OFF.WE ARE ON THE ROAD ABOUT HALF AN HOUR.SOME OF THE PLACES WE GO ARE SEATON CAREW, PRESTON PARK AND WHITLEY BAY. WHEN WE GET THERE WE PLAY AND HAVE A SANDWICH,THEN IF WE ARE AT THE SEA WE GO FOR A SWIM,THEN HAVE OUR DINNER.AFTER OUR DINNER WE LOOK AROUND THE SHOPS AND ARCADES, AND THEN WE GO HOME. ANDREW PIKE
